solution_line_template: First find how many liters of the seawater are salt: {seawater_volume_liters} liters * {salt_percentage_num}% = <<{seawater_volume_liters}*{salt_percentage_num}*{percent_to_decimal_factor}={salt_volume_liters}>>{salt_volume_liters} liters

Then multiply that amount by {ml_per_liter} ml/liter to find the number of ml of salt Jack gets: {salt_volume_liters} liters * {ml_per_liter} ml/liter = <<{salt_volume_liters}*{ml_per_liter}={salt_volume_ml}>>{salt_volume_ml} ml
